name: PETSCII Pete
description:
PETSCII Pete

A simple but frustrating platformer based on Manic Miner for the C64 'Cassette 50' charity competition. Can you guide PETSCII Pete through all 4 (yes, four!) levels?

https://itch.io/jam/the-c64-cassette-50-charity-competition/rate/856693

All code below $1000 in memory.
